title: In the area of Regional Plans (excluding the area of Local Bodies and SPA where Development Plan or planning proposal is sanctioned) "Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana" shall be permitted subject to the provisions of Regulation No
clause_text: In the area of Regional Plans (excluding the area of Local Bodies and SPA where Development Plan or planning proposal is sanctioned) "Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana" shall be permitted subject to the provisions of Regulation No.14.4.2.
